channel.title: Projects on Zhengjie Miao's Home
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Zhengjie Miao's Home

item.title: IEEE VAST Challenge 2014 Mini-Challenge 1
item.description:
The challenge was on HERE. We developed a analysis tool consists of three views for this challenge: Resume Reader, News Timeline and Email Reader. Through interactions, analysts can discover the development of events and find the suspicious people in the events.

It won the Award for Excellent Detailed Analysis on this challenge.

item.title: BDWM BBS Crawler
item.description:
Course Project of Java Programming(2013 Spring)

A highly stylized thread viewer for PKU BBS. A dedicated crawler pulls down all the threads of user-specified boards using java multi-threading. Texts are then scanned and processed to calculate features of the current board. A overview is shown and then user can click to see details of the thread including the social network of each forum section.
